sampleProducts.title: iPhone 15 Pro Max
sampleProducts.description: The most advanced iPhone ever with titanium design, A17 Pro chip, and professional camera system. Features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology for incredibly smooth scrolling and responsiveness.

sampleProducts.title: Nike Air Max 270
sampleProducts.description: Comfortable running shoes with Max Air unit in the heel for exceptional cushioning. Perfect for daily wear and light workouts. Features breathable mesh upper and durable rubber outsole.

sampleProducts.title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
sampleProducts.description: Industry-leading noise canceling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life and premium sound quality. Features advanced noise canceling technology and crystal-clear hands-free calling.

sampleProducts.title: Levi's 501 Original Jeans
sampleProducts.description: Classic straight-leg jeans made from 100% cotton denim. The original blue jean since 1873. Features button fly and classic 5-pocket styling for timeless appeal.

sampleProducts.title: MacBook Pro 14-inch M3
sampleProducts.description: Supercharged by M3 chip with 8-core CPU and 10-core GPU. Features Liquid Retina XDR display and up to 22 hours of battery life. Perfect for professionals and creators.
